channel.title: Portforwarding - URGENT!
channel.description:
Basically guys i need help with portforwarding, i have an PI source/client which i want to make online so me and my friends can play on it but i have been struggling to portforward the source/client and when i try logging in, it does not allow me =/
Can anyone help me, i will pay if i have to
P.S- i have TV if needed
